title: Beef Wellington
description: Beef Wellington makes an impressive centrepiece for a special dinner. This version keeps the pastry nice and crisp with a layer of crêpes.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz waxy spuds, peeled and very finely sliced (preferably on a mandoline)
500ml/18fl oz veal stock (or beef or chicken stock)
1 heaped tbsp truffle peelings in brine, drained
